content.text:
I'll solve this task by analyzing the images and providing a detailed solution:

1. Main Target Image Analysis:
- Total Blocks: 8 blocks
- Layers: 3 layers
- Color Composition:
  * Orange triangular roof blocks (top layer)
  * Green and red rectangular blocks (middle layer)
  * Yellow and blue rectangular blocks (bottom layer)

2. Block Dictionary Selection:
Required block indices:
- Orange triangular roof block (indices 12, 13, 14, 15, 16)
- Red rectangular blocks (indices 1, 2, 3, 6)
- Green rectangular blocks (indices 5, 8, 9)
- Yellow rectangular blocks (indices 7, 10, 11)
- Blue rectangular block (index 4)

3. Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 4 (blue block)
    Step2: Move block with index 6 (red block) next to blue block
    Step3: Move block with index 11 (yellow block) on top of blue and red blocks
    Step4: Move block with index 9 (green block) adjacent to the structure
    Step5: Move block with index 6 (another red block) next to the green block
    Step6: Move block with index 12 (orange triangular block) on top of the yellow block
}
